summary: Follows the intertwining stories of Walter Dishman, a melancholy parole officer struggling with the doldrums of married life, and three eccentric ex-convicts recently placed under his supervision.
cast: David Denman|Gillian Jacobs|Kevin Hart|Edward Asner|Simon Helberg|Maria Thayer|Alexandra Holden|Kali Hawk|Robert Bagnell|Jack Carter|Peggy McCay|Amy Stiller|Johnny Pemberton|Ogy Durham|Catherine Reitman|Edward Fordham Jr.|Sarah Buehler|Rance Howard|Garrett Morris|Bunny Levine|Jeremy Denzlinger|Rob Elk|Jonathan Spencer|Deborah Theaker|Kirk Fox|David A. Cooper|Dayo Ade|Esther Paik|Greg Joung Paik|Jeanine Anderson|Brian Palermo|Brian Huskey|Ron Garcia|Katherine Flynn|Leslie Thurston|Chad Jamian|Donald Rizzo|Scott Beehner|Barbara Perry|Dov Davidoff|Dmitri Schuyler-Linch|Kristin Minter|Don Perry|Eric Edelstein|Price Carson|Craig Pearman|Brande Roderick|Kiva Jump|Marguerite Gioia Insolia|John Kaiser
title: Let Go
